short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display price per oz/unit on items, and sort price low to high on your favorite grocery delivery service for easy cost comparison!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When searching in Shipt, options are displayed in the left nav bar which allow you to calculate a products cost per oz/count, and to sort by price low to high!

v1.2
Added information to extension popup

v1.1
Cleaned it up a little and made it more reliable

v1.0
First release!
